body.name: PAYOT - Herbier Range - Organic Revitalizing Body Oil with Thyme Essential Oil - France - 95 ml Glass Jar
features: After one month of use** Detoxifies the skin: 100% Invigorates the body and mind: 100% Revitalizes and tones the skin: 100% The skin is more beautiful and enhanced: 100%
IDEAL FOR All types of skin
Apply to the body and massage in for a real moment of well-being.
body.description: Discover the Huile Corps Revitalisante with organic thyme essential oil, made from 100% ingredients of natural origin and just 6 ingredients. Specially designed for skin lacking nutrition, this body oil intensely nourishes the skin with its combination of soya, olive, and sunflower oils. Selected for its invigorating and revitalizing properties, thyme essential oil brings suppleness and comfort to the skin and encourages massage for an intense moment of relaxation. You will love its texture with a melt-in feel and dry finish that reveals the soft, lemony notes of thyme essential oil.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars This is a cleansing oil

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 14, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smells so good
reviews.reviewText: This body oil smells so good and leaves my skin feeling so soft and hydrated. The body oil is a bit pricey but, thankfully a few drops is needed for each area.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 4, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lovely, luxe oil; leaves my rough dry skin feeling smooth & soft + subtle fragrance....
reviews.reviewText: This is a lovely oil -- I chose the revitalizing body oil which is a light-weight but rich feeling oil that goes on smoothly and is absorbed quickly. It has a luxurious feel and leaves a slight sheen on my skin but it doesn't have an oily look or feel. I apply it after my shower when my skin is still damp. My skin feels very soft, smooth and supple and the effects last all day. It is also great to use on my dry, rough hands after doing household chores or working in my garden and it really helps keep them nice (cuticles and nails, too). The oil has a light herbal scent that I really like; it is rather subtle and doesn't linger very long. There is no added fragrance, just the scent from the ingredients: organic oils (thyme, soybean, olive and sunflower) + tocopherol, alkanes, geraniol, limonene and linolool. The current price of $41.00 seems reasonable for this luxe, well formulated oil -- it is made in France and the quality is excellent. The oil is housed in a nice, heavy glass bottle with an orifice reducer under the cap to control how much of the product is dispensed and prevent waste. The oil arrived boxed and sealed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 24, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Skin loving oil
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. As you can see in the video, this oil leaves a slight sheen to your skin.Wonderful to put on while your skin is still wet from bathing, right before you pat yourself dry with a luxurious Turkish towel.Leaves your skin soft and silky. I believe this would be fine for any gender. Not a lot of fragrance to it, and another big plus is that the precious oil in this glass bottle, is organic.Crafted in France.Excellent product, highly recommended.
